name: Rival Bots
description:
Overview

Rival Bots is a local multiplayer game allowing up to 4 players to face off in head to head competition. Shoot, jump on, or spike your opponents and be the last one standing to win. Every stage is randomly generated so each fight will be a unique experience!

Features

  • 2-4 player local multiplayer
  • Controller and Keyboard support
  • Every stage is randomly generated
  • Destructible and falling platforms that dynamically change the environment
  • Customize game options

*No single player

**The 'shift' key is used to throw spike balls, so be sure to turn off sticky keys
